Making appropriations for financial services and general government for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2018, and for other purposes.
Financial Services and General Government Appropriations Act, 2018

action.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 115-234, by Mr. Graves (GA).

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 167.
